title: Night Knight
description: The princess of Lomon kingdom, Lily, doesn't believe in the existence of Night Knight, a warrior who rushes in the sky with his horse in dark night, and helps those in need. But one day, a miracle happens, that completely changes Lily's life... The book was originally written in Georgian by 17 years old author and translated to English by author herself. The picture belongs to Aurelien, a.k.a eldacar-elfinan, a wonderful artist on deviantart.com.
author: Tamuna Tsertsvadze
